hints.content:
We start at $11{:}54$ when Kaleigh starts baking her cake.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 11:50 to 12:40 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 11:50, 12:00, 12:10, 12:20, 12:30, and 12:40 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled tick mark at 11:54. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Kaleigh finishes baking her cake, we go **right** ${28}$ minutes from $11{:}54$.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{11{:}54} +{} &\goldE{6}\text{ minutes} = 12{:}00\\\\
{12{:}00} +{} &\purpleD{20}\text{ minutes} = 12{:}20\\\\
12{:}20 +{} & \greenD{2}\text{ minutes} = \blueD{12{:}22}
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 11:50 to 12:40 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 11:50, 12:00, 12:10, 12:20, 12:30, and 12:40 are labeled. A series of three arrows are shown moving left to right from the 11:54 tick mark to the 12:22 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 11:54 tick mark and ends at the 12:00 tick mark and is labeled plus 6. The second arrow starts at the 12:00 tick mark and ends at the 12:20 tick mark and is labeled plus 20. The third arrow starts at the 12:20 tick mark and ends at the 12:22 tick mark and is labeled plus 2. !

hints.content:
Kaleigh finished baking her cake at $\blueD{12{:}22} $.  

Which clock shows $\blueD{12{:}22}$?

When Kaleigh finishes baking her cake, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 12 and 1 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 4. !

question.content:
It takes Kaleigh $28$ minutes to bake a cake. She put the cake in the oven at $11{:}54 \text { a.m.}$

**What time does the clock show when Kaleigh finishes baking her cake?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 11 and 12 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d983fcefc3c07b51f0e50acccfa1084b9f3d15d9)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 12 and 1 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 4.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0b71a8796f5073355eecf080af560b88bdbcfc43)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 12 and 1 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/db5a0d9b1e60a9a35a4bb79382d6e38ec5539e7b)
